## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                                           | Type                                  | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------- | ----------- |

| `layout` | `layout`  | Determines how the label and content is laid out                                      | `"default" \| "inline-space-between"` | `'default'` |
